ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I compare aspects of my appearance to others.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little; 2 = Often; 3 = A lot; 4 = All the time

ElementDescription: I check my appearance (e.g., in mirrors, by touching with my fingers, or by taking photos of myself).
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little; 2 = Often; 3 = A lot; 4 = All the time

ElementDescription: I avoid situations or people because of my appearance.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little; 2 = Often; 3 = A lot; 4 = All the time

ElementDescription: I brood about past events or reasons to explain why I look the way I do.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little; 2 = Often; 3 = A lot; 4 = All the time

ElementDescription: I think about how to camouflage or alter my appearance.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little; 2 = Often; 3 = A lot; 4 = All the time

ElementDescription: I am focussed on how I feel I look, rather than on my own surroundings.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little; 2 = Often; 3 = A lot; 4 = All the time

ElementDescription: I avoid reflective surfaces, photos, or videos of myself.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little; 2 = Often; 3 = A lot; 4 = All the time

ElementDescription: I discuss my appearance with others or question them about it.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little; 2 = Often; 3 = A lot; 4 = All the time

ElementDescription: I try to camouflage or alter aspects of my appearance.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little; 2 = Often; 3 = A lot; 4 = All the time

ElementDescription: I try to prevent people from seeing aspects of my appearance within particular situations (e.g., by changing my posture, avoiding bright lights)
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little; 2 = Often; 3 = A lot; 4 = All the time

ElementDescription: Total Raw Score
Avoidance Score
Threat Monitoring Score
